title: Book Online at Nicole McLaughlin Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Book an Appointment Effective September 15, 2023, a 3% credit card surcharge, which includes FSA/HSA cards, will be applied to all billing transactions. If you prefer another method of payment, you may use Zelle upon request, but we ask that you leave a secondary form of payment for security purposes and a contactless experience. For general support contact info@nicolemclaughlinacupuncture.com Welcome to our online booking site Acupuncture [Read More](1-description) Acupuncture is an amazing, comprehensive system of healing and health. It relieves pain, improves blood flow, clears inflammation, and calms the nervous system. In addition, you'll likely notice better sleep, deep relaxation, and a clear mind. Acupuncture has a domino effect or chain reaction. Very often, the result of treating a primary concern will also resolve other issues. More and more people are discovering the benefits of acupuncture — and you should too! Chinese Herbal Medicine [Read More](3-description) Acupuncture and Chinese herbal medicine are two complementary systems that interact with each other. They're used independently or together. As a joint force, acupuncture and Chinese herbal medicine cooperatively support and increase the other's effect. Chinese herbal medicine deepens and strengthens the potency of your acupuncture treatments. When combined, acute and chronic systemic issues are addressed more quickly. Cupping Therapy [Read More](5-description) Cupping is primarily used for pain relief and to boost the immune system. Cupping pulls the skin, fascia, and muscles into the cups, promoting circulation, releasing tension, and strengthening your lungs. Whether you add cupping to your acupuncture treatment or get cupping therapy with tuina massage, you'll feel the value of this specialty. Cupping is safe, effective, and natural — discover the benefits for yourself! Tuina Massage Tuina massage is a type of acupressure bodywork. Whether you add tuina massage to your acupuncture treatment or get tuina massage with cupping therapy, you'll experience positive effects. Tuina massages are beneficial for infants, children, expecting mothers-to-be, and everyone in between. Tuina massage is safe, natural, and effective — discover the benefits for yourself! Biomat The Biomat is a medical device that can help improve sleep, reduce stress and fatigue, support the immune system, reduce inflammation, and promote relaxation. It can also provide temporary relief from minor joint and muscle pains, strains, spasms, and sprains. A Biomat Session is an incredible add-on to your acupuncture visit.
